title: George Clinton & Family - 6 Degrees of P-Funk (2003) [FLAC]
description:
At its height, George Clinton's P-Funk empire had a number of acts signed to
different labels. During the late '70s and '80s a number of these artists were
recording for both Columbia and Epic Records. Each act was distinguishable from the other but they all contributed to have one thing in common - the awesome power of the P-Funk. Six Degrees documents these varied yet comparable acts that showcase the amazing and prolific work of George Clinton and his Funky Family.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------

   2. (00:05:36) George Clinton & the P-Funk All Stars - Funky Kind (Gonna Knock It Down)

   4. (00:04:17) Bootsy Collins - Leakin'

   7. (00:04:36) Mutiny - Lump
   8. (00:04:18) Mutiny - Funk 'n Bop
   9. (00:04:12) Phillippe Wynne - Never Gonna Tell It
  10. (00:05:04) Phillippe Wynne - Breakout
  11. (00:06:50) Sweat Band - Freak To Freak
  12. (00:05:05) Mico Wave - Instant Replay

  14. (00:04:38) P-Funk All Stars - One of Those Summers
